author: keykode95
content:
Hey guys! I'm Flaviu, software developer, looking to contribute to something that I really care about.
More exactly, I believe that with the power of Ethereum we can make the world a better place, not only from an economic standpoint, but also, drastically change how the society works.

content: welcome! what sort of things are you interested in working on?

author: torchhorse4830
content: My NFT avatar has a rayonism style to it. Is that project still occurring?

author: keykode95
content:
Most of my experience consists of designing and building microservices based on event-driven architecture.
I'm proficient in Java, Spring, REST, Kafka, RabbitMQ. 
Also, I have some experience with Python, Go, Javascript, and DevOps.

author: protolambda
content: No, we stopped the sun emoji since it conflicts with the solana brand, and rayonism is done (merge prototype worked, now need to productionize)
